query.message: I want to find a nice to-go meal. Any suggestions?
Sure. What city should I search in?
Vallejo.
Alright. Are you looking to get food on a specific date?
Yes, on March 5th.
Got it. Do you have a time in mind?
Around 6:15 in the evening.
I’ll be visiting the city for a short stay and I’m thinking about renting a car.
Sure. Where would you like to pick up the car?
Downtown Berlin would be best.
Got it. When would you like to pick it up?
Around noon on March 8th.
How long do you plan to keep the car?
Just for a couple of days. I’ll mostly be driving within the city.
I need a place to stay during my trip.
Sure. Which city are you planning to stay in?
I’ll be staying in Vallejo.
Got it. When will you be checking in?
March 5th.
And how long will you be staying?
Just for one night.
I need a ride to get across town.
Sure. Where would you like to go?
To 39145 Farwell Drive.
Got it. When would you like to be picked up?
In about half an hour.
Okay, I’ll note that.
I’m looking for a place to stay for one night.
Sure. Which city will you be staying in?
Berkeley.
When do you plan to check in?
On March 11th.
Do you have any specific requirements for the stay?
Nothing special. I’ll be arriving late and leaving early, so I just need somewhere straightforward.
I need to book a flight for an upcoming trip.
Sure. Where will you be flying from and to?
From San Francisco to Seattle.
When do you plan to depart?
On March 9th.
Do you have a preferred departure time?
No, anytime during the day works.
I need to take a bus to another city.
Sure. Where will you be traveling from and to?
From San Jose to Sacramento.
When would you like to depart?
On March 10th in the morning.
Is there anything else I should consider for your trip?
No, it’s just a straightforward trip.
I need to book a flight for an upcoming trip.
Sure. Where will you be flying from and to?
From Los Angeles to Denver.
When do you plan to depart?
On March 12th.
I need a ride to get to an appointment.
Sure. Where are you heading?
To 39145 Farwell Drive.
When would you like to be picked up?
I’m interested in attending an art exhibition.
Sure. Do you have a specific type of event in mind?
An exhibition would be good.
Which city should I look in?
San Francisco.
Do you have a preferred venue or area?
Somewhere downtown would be fine.
I’m looking for a quiet restaurant.
Sure. Do you have a particular type of cuisine in mind?
Something Italian would be nice.
Would you prefer a place that serves alcohol or one that doesn’t?
It doesn’t need to serve alcohol.
